value:
A forbidden love between Heroes
from different worlds... Oh, now that
sounds juicy.$k$pReturning home would tear them
apart, but if they stay together...
This is getting good!

I was raised in the Deeprealms, but
sometimes I'd sneak out to pursue
my true calling as a chivalrous thief!

Consider this your lucky day! I'm
gonna start going on patrols with you.
What's with that look?$k$pIt's for your safety! You can't fight, so
it's dangerous for you to go alone. I'll
be your bodyguard!

Is it just me, or does your weapon
share a special bond with Prince
Alfonse's weapon?$k$pHey, let's store them beside each
other in the armory and see if any
sparks fly!

Oh, I was just reading this book—a
totally normal book. So don't even
bother asking my parents about it!$k$pWhile we're on the topic, anything
you hear about my books or reading
habits is a complete lie. All right?

Oh, now those two would make a
great pair... Hehe—gyah! How long
have you been there?!$k$pHi from $Nf!
Bye!

This is one daydream you can't
wake me from!

Not bad, not bad... But next time
will be even better!

Sometimes you have to take the
thorns with the roses.

Thanks for the new power! Today
will have a storybook ending!

It's good to meet you. I'm Nina. Niles
is my father, but let's not worry about
him. I'm gonna do what I think is right!

Heehee... I've had such good
daydreams since coming here. It feels
like I'm still in one.$k$pI can even feel a hand...on...my
shoulder... EEK!
$Nu?!$k$pWh-what's the big idea, huh? Speak
up before approaching someone
who's daydreaming!$k$pI was just imagining what might
happen if a Summoner happened to
summon a certain Hero...$k$pDon't tell me that's not the best
combo! Summoner and summoned!
A story of the bond they share...$k$pAnd the sad fate that awaits them
as they're one day forced to return to
their homes.$k$pIt practically writes itself because it
describes us so— So...perfectly...
Hadn't thought about that before...$k$pKinda makes me sad. After all this
time we've spent together, one day...$k$pWell, let's not dwell on it. We've still
got a long way to go before we say
our good-byes!$k$pI'll find all sorts of creative ways to
keep you happy until then...$k$pLike sending all our enemies up to
the heavens!
たあっ！
せやっ！
んもう！
What's the idea?!
In your dreams...
I spy a corpse.
Here's a taste!
Let's have some fun.
I guess dreams don't come true…
Hmm...
What is it? It's not like I'm doing anything strange! Honest!
If THAT Hero and THAT Hero were together... Oh, wow...
Is my father here? It's not like I want to see him. I was just thinking about what a pain it would be if he was.
You know, I used to be a thief. You should send me out to scout on the enemy!
Ahh! Don't creep up on me like that! I was daydreaming! It was so nice, and you ruined it.
If I could summon Heroes, I'd summon so many different people…
There's so much to see here, so many people to... I mean, so many things to learn! I hope I get to stay!
K!
Nina time!
Let me get a taste.
